name: Midnight Musk
description: A sensual blend of musk and amber with sweet vanilla notes.

name: Citrus Rush
description: Bright citrus fragrance with hints of orange, lemon, and mint.

name: Floral Dream
description: Light floral scent with rose, jasmine, and lily.

name: Woody Wonder
description: Earthy fragrance combining cedarwood, sandalwood, and patchouli.

name: Ocean Breeze
description: Fresh marine scent with sea salt, driftwood, and citrus undertones.

name: Spice Storm
description: Intense spicy aroma with cinnamon, clove, and black pepper.

name: Velvet Rose
description: Deep romantic rose scent with hints of oud and honey.

name: Vanilla Sky
description: Warm vanilla fragrance mixed with caramel and tonka bean.

name: Green Escape
description: Herbal green fragrance with basil, vetiver, and green tea.

name: Smoky Nights
description: Mysterious smoky blend of incense, leather, and tobacco.

name: Sugar Bloom
description: Sweet gourmand scent with cotton candy, pear, and peony.

name: Amber Soul
description: A rich amber-based perfume with myrrh, vanilla, and spice.
